edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.geometry

Class Polyline

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.geometry.Geometry
        • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.geometry.Polyline

  • public class Polyline
extends Geometry
    An array of paths where each path is an array of points.
    Author:
    Justin Merz

      • removePoint

        public final Point removePoint(int pathIndex,
                int pointIndex)
        Remove a point from the polyline at the given pointIndex within the path identified by the given pathIndex.
        Parameters:
        pathIndex - - The index of the path containing the point.
        pointIndex - - The index of the point within the path.
